mapper.select: select *,date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') regdate, pid from posts where title like concat('%',#{query},'%') or maker like concat('%',#{query},'%') order by pid desc limit #{start}, #{size};
select *,date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') regdate, writer, title (select count(*) from posts where pid=#{pid} and title=#{title}) pid from posts where pid=#{pid}
